member.name: T:KModkit.KMBombInfoExtensions
member.summary: Some helper extensions methods for the KMBombInfo class.

member.name: T:GlobalCommands
member.summary: Commands that can generally be used at any time.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.Help(System.String,System.Boolean)
Help
member.summary: Gives you some help on how to play TP.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.BonusPoints(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
Bonus Points
member.summary: Adds points to a player's score.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.BonusSolves(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
Bonus Solves
member.summary: Adds solves to a player.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.BonusStrikes(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
Bonus Strikes
member.summary: Adds strikes to a player.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.SetReward(System.Int32)
Set Reward
member.summary: Sets the reward that's given out on a succesful defusual.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.AddReward(System.Int32)
Add Reward
member.summary: Adds to the reward that's given out on a succesful defusual.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.TimeMode(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
Time Mode
member.summary: Enables or disables time mode. [state] is either on or off.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.VsMode(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
VS Mode
member.summary: Enables or disables VS mode. [state] is either on or off.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ZenMode(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
Zen Mode
member.summary: Enables or disables zen mode. [state] is either on or off.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.TrainingMode(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
Training Mode
member.summary: Enables or disables training mode. [state] is either on or off.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ShowMode(System.String,System.Boolean)
Show Mode
member.summary: Sends a message to chat with the current and upcoming mode.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ResetUser(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Reset User
member.summary: Resets a user's information on the leaderboard. [users] is a list of usernames seperated by a semicolon.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.VoteStart(System.String,System.Boolean)
Start a vote
member.summary: Starts a vote about doing an action

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.Vote(System.String,System.Boolean)
Vote
member.summary: Vote with yes or no

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.RemoveVote(System.String)
Remove vote
member.summary: Removes the vote of a user

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ShowVoteTime(System.String)
Time left of vote
member.summary: Shows remaining voting time

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.CancelVote(System.String)
Cancel vote
member.summary: Cancels a voting process

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ForceEndVote(System.String)
Force-end vote
member.summary: Skips the countdown of the voting process

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.OwnRank(System.String,System.Boolean)
My Rank
member.summary: Sends a message with what your current rank is.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.SoloRank(System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean)
Get Solo Rank
member.summary: Sends a message with who currently has that solo rank.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.SoloRankByUser(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Get Solo Rank By User
member.summary: Sends a message with the solo rank of that user.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.Rank(System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean)
Get Rank
member.summary: Sends a message with who currently has that rank.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.RankByUser(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Get Rank By User
member.summary: Sends a message with the rank of that user.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.Log
Get Previous Log
member.summary: Sends a message with the previous log.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.LogNow(System.String,System.Boolean)
Get Log
member.summary: Sends a message with the current log.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ShortURL(System.String,System.Boolean)
Toggle Short URLs
member.summary: Toggles shortened URLs.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.BuildDate(System.String,System.Boolean)
Build Date
member.summary: Sends a message with the build date of TP.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.AddRemoveRole(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Add/Remove Rank
member.summary: Adds or removes a user from a rank. [rank] can be multiple ranks seperated by spaces.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.Moderators(System.String,System.Boolean)
Moderators
member.summary: If enabled, sends to chat a list of users who have the moderator rank or above.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.RunSpecific(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Int32,KMGameInfo)
Run Specific
member.summary: Runs a distribution with a set number of modules. [distribution] can be vanilla, light, mixed, heavy and mods. There are also a few combinations like mixedlight and extralight. Which goes from all vanilla to all modded modules.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.RunMission(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,KMGameInfo)
Run Mission
member.summary: Runs a named mission. Mods can give any mission ID to run.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.RunRaw(System.String)
Run Raw
member.summary: Runs a mission by it's full ID. Examples: mod_TwitchPlays_tpFMNHell or firsttime. Will softlock if required modules are mission or ID is incorrect.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.RunRawSeed(System.String,System.String)
Run Raw Seed
member.summary: The same as Run Raw but allows you to specify a seed.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ProfileHelp(System.String,System.Boolean)
Profile Help
member.summary: Gives you help on the profile commands.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ProfileEnable(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Profile Enable
member.summary: Enables a profile.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ProfileDisable(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Profile Disable
member.summary: Disables a profile.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ProfilesListEnabled(System.String,System.Boolean)
Profile Enabled
member.summary: Lists out the enabled profiles.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ProfilesListAll(System.String,System.Boolean)
Profile List
member.summary: Lists out all the profiles available.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ProfileModule(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
Profile Add/Remove Module
member.summary: Adds or removes a module from a profile. [module] can be a partial module name or ID and can be surrounded with quotes if the name has a space. [profile] can be a partial profile name.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ReloadData(System.String,System.Boolean)
Reload Data
member.summary: Reloads all the data that TP uses. Like settings, access levels, etc.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.Elevator(System.String)
Change Elevator
member.summary: Changes the enabled state of the elevator.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.RestartGame
Restart
member.summary: Restarts the game by closing and reopening it. May not work perfectly when running with Steam.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.QuitGame
Quit
member.summary: Quits KTANE.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.CheckForUpdates
Check For Updates
member.summary: Checks to see if there is a new build of TP on Dropbox. Only applicable if you are using the Dropbox version of TP.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.Update
Update
member.summary: If there is an update available, installs it and restarts the game. Only applicable if you are using the Dropbox version of TP.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.ResetLeaderboard(System.String,System.Boolean)
Reset Leaderboard
member.summary: Resets all the information on the leaderboard.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.DisableWhitelist
Disable Whitelist
member.summary: Disables the whitelist.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.EnableWhitelist
Enable Whitelist
member.summary: Enables the whitelist.

member.name: M:GlobalCommands.Mimic(System.String,System.String,IRCMessage)
Mimic
member.summary: Makes it seem like another player ran the specified command. Only works with players of the same rank or lower.

member.name: T:GameCommands
member.summary: Commands that can be run during a game.

member.name: M:GameCommands.Cancel
Cancel
member.summary: Cancels the current running command.

member.name: M:GameCommands.Stop
Stop
member.summary: Stops the current and queued commands.

member.name: M:GameCommands.ShowNotes(System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean)
Get Notes
member.summary: Sends the contents of a note to chat.

member.name: M:GameCommands.SetNotes(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Set Notes
member.summary: Sets the contents of a note.

member.name: M:GameCommands.SetNotesAppend(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Append Notes
member.summary: Appends the contents of a note.
member.argument: The text that will be appended to the note.

member.name: M:GameCommands.SetNotesClear(System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean)
Clear Notes
member.summary: Clears the contents of a note.

member.name: M:GameCommands.Snooze
Snooze
member.summary: Snoozes the alarm clock.

member.name: M:GameCommands.ShowClaimsOfAnotherPlayer(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Show Claims
member.summary: Shows the claims of another user.
member.argument: The user whose claims you want to see.

member.name: M:GameCommands.ShowClaims(System.String,System.Boolean)
Claims
member.summary: Shows all of your claims.

member.name: M:GameCommands.ClaimViewPin(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Claim View Pin
member.summary: Claims, views or pins a list of module codes. (actions) should be some combination of claim, view or pin seperated by spaces.
member.argument: A combination of claim, view or pin seperated by spaces.
A list of module codes to take the actions on. Can be "all" to do the action on all unsolved modules.

member.name: M:GameCommands.ClaimAny(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
Claim Any
member.summary: Claims one unsolved and unclaimed module from a source. any, van or mod are acceptable sources.
member.argument: The source of the modules to pick from. any for any module, van for vanilla and mod for modded modules.

member.name: M:GameCommands.UnclaimAll(System.String,System.Boolean)
Unclaim All
member.summary: Unclaims all modules you have claimed and queued claims. If queued is used instead of all, then only queued claims will be removed.

member.name: M:GameCommands.UnclaimSpecific(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Unclaim Specific
member.summary: Unclaims a list of module codes.
member.argument: A list of module codes to unclaim.

member.name: M:GameCommands.ListUnclaimed(System.String,System.Boolean)
Unclaimed
member.summary: Sends a maximum of 3 unclaimed modules to chat.

member.name: M:GameCommands.ListUnsolved(System.String,System.Boolean)
Unsolved
member.summary: Sends a maximum of 3 unsolved modules to chat.

member.name: M:GameCommands.FindClaimView(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Find Claim View
member.summary: Finds modules based on their module name. [what] can be partial module names seperated by commas or semicolons. If (actions) are specified, they will be executed on the matching modules.
member.argument: A combination of claim or view seperated by spaces.
Partial module names seperated by commas or semicolons.

member.name: M:GameCommands.FindPlayer(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Find Player
member.summary: Finds claimed modules based on their module name and shows who has the claim on the module. [what] can be partial module names seperated by commas or semicolons.
member.argument: A combination of claim or view seperated by spaces.

member.name: M:GameCommands.FindSolved(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Find Solved
member.summary: Finds solved modules based on their module name and shows who has the claim on the module. [what] can be partial module names seperated by commas or semicolons.
member.argument: A combination of claim or view seperated by spaces.

member.name: M:GameCommands.NewBomb(System.String,System.Boolean)
New Bomb
member.summary: Starts a new bomb in training mode. Requires either a minimum score or the defuser rank to run.

member.name: M:GameCommands.FillEdgework(System.String,System.Boolean)
Fill Edgework
member.summary: Fills in the text-based edgework. Requires either mod rank or it to be enabled for everyone.

member.name: M:GameCommands.EdgeworkElevator(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Elevator Edgework
member.summary: Shows the edgework on the elevator. (wall) is which wall of the elevator to show, ex: right, left or back.

member.name: M:GameCommands.Edgework(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Edgework
member.summary: Rotates the bomb to show the edgework. (edge) is which edge of the bomb will be shown, ex: top or top left. Using 45 will rotate the bomb in 45 degree increments.

member.name: M:GameCommands.EnableCameraWall(System.String)
Enable Camera Wall
member.summary: Enables the camera wall. If automatic camera wall is enabled, mod permission is required to use.

member.name: M:GameCommands.DisableCameraWall(System.String)
Disable Camera Wall
member.summary: Disables the camera wall. If automatic camera wall is enabled, mod permission is required to use.

member.name: M:GameCommands.EnqueueNamedCommand(IRCMessage,System.String,System.String)
Queue Named Command
member.summary: Queues a command that can be called by name.

member.name: M:GameCommands.EnqueueUnnamedCommand(IRCMessage,System.String)
Queue Command
member.summary: Queues a command that will be called in order.

member.name: M:GameCommands.UnqueueCommand(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
Unqueue/Show Command
member.summary: Unqueues, deletes or shows a queued command. Unqueuing only allows you to remove your own commands. Deleting is a moderator only action that can remove any command.
member.argument: The command to find in the queue. Can be "all" for all of your commands or just all commands if delqueue is being used.

member.name: M:GameCommands.CallQueuedCommand(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
Call Command
member.summary: Calls a command from the queue. callnow skips the requirement set by Call Set. If (name) is specified calls a named command instead of the next command in the queue.

member.name: M:GameCommands.CallAllQueuedCommands(System.String,System.Boolean)
Call All
member.summary: Calls all commands, including named ones.

member.name: M:GameCommands.CallSetCommand(System.String,System.Int32)
Call Set
member.summary: Sets a minimum a number of times Call Command must be run for a command to be called.

member.name: M:GameCommands.CallCountCommand
Call Count
member.summary: Displays the number of times that the Call Command has been run since a command was last called.

member.name: M:GameCommands.RemoveQueuedPlayer(System.String)
Uncall
member.summary: Retracts your Call Command when multiple are required.

member.name: M:GameCommands.ListCalledPlayers(System.String)
Call Players
member.summary: Lists the current players who have called when multiple are required.

member.name: M:GameCommands.SetMultiplier(System.Single)
Set Multiplier
member.summary: Sets the time mode multiplier.

member.name: M:GameCommands.SolveBomb
Solve Bomb
member.summary: Solves the currently held bomb.

member.name: M:GameCommands.EnableClaims
Enable Claims
member.summary: Enables the ability to claim modules.

member.name: M:GameCommands.DisableClaims
Disable Claims
member.summary: Disables the ability to claim modules.

member.name: M:GameCommands.AssignModuleTo(System.String,System.String,System.String)
Assign
member.summary: Assigns modules to a user based on their module codes.

member.name: M:GameCommands.BotUnclaim
Bot Unclaim
member.summary: Makes the bot unclaim any module it has claimed.

member.name: M:GameCommands.DisableInteractive
Disable Interactive
member.summary: Disables interactive mode on the cameras. As if the escape key hadn't been pressed.

member.name: M:GameCommands.ReturnToSetup
Return To Setup
member.summary: Forces the game to return to the setup room.

member.name: M:GameCommands.EnableInteractiveMode
Enable Interactive Mode
member.summary: Enables interactive mode, allowing the streamer to interact with the bomb.

member.name: M:GameCommands.DisableInteractiveMode
Disable Interactive Mode
member.summary: Disables interactive mode, preventing the streamer from interacting with the bomb.

member.name: M:GameCommands.SolveUnsupportedModules
Solve Unsupported Modules
member.summary: Solves modules that aren't supported by TP.

member.name: M:GameCommands.RemoveSolveBasedModules
Remove Solve Based Modules
member.summary: Solves modules that depend on the solve count of the bomb.

member.name: M:GameCommands.DefaultCommand(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Custom Messages
member.summary: These commands send a predefined message to chat. Streamers can choose their own messages but the ones mentioned here are included by default.

member.name: T:AlarmClockCommands
member.summary: Commands for the alarm clock.

member.name: M:AlarmClockCommands.Snooze(TwitchHoldable,System.String,System.Boolean)
Snooze
member.summary: Hits the snooze button on the alarm clock.

Disconnect

member.summary: Selects the currently highlighted item.

member.summary: Selects an item based on it's index on the page.

Up / Down
member.summary: Moves up or down the page by a number items.

member.name: M:MissionBinderCommands.Search(FloatingHoldable,System.String)
Search
member.summary: Searches the binder for a mission.

member.name: M:BombCommands.Help(System.String,System.Boolean)
Help
member.summary: Gives you information about various bomb commands.

Turn
member.summary: Turns the bomb around.

Hold
member.summary: Holds the bomb.

Drop
member.summary: Drops the bomb.

member.name: M:BombCommands.Throw(TwitchBomb,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
Throw
member.summary: Throws the bomb. (strength) is how much force the bomb is thrown with.

member.summary: Shows the edgework on the elevator. (wall) is which wall of the elevator to show, ex: right, left or back.

Edgework
member.summary: Rotates the bomb to show the edgework. (edge) is which edge of the bomb will be shown, ex: top or top left. Using 45 will rotate the bomb in 45 degree increments.

member.name: M:BombCommands.Time(TwitchBomb,System.String,System.Boolean)
Time
member.summary: Sends a message with how much time is left.

member.name: M:BombCommands.Timestamp(TwitchBomb,System.String,System.Boolean)
Timestamp
member.summary: Sends a message with when the bomb started.

End Training Mode
member.summary: Ends a training mode bomb. Requires either Defuser rank or a minimum score.

member.name: M:BombCommands.Explode(TwitchBomb)
Explode
member.summary: Forces the bomb to explode.

Start a vote
member.summary: Starts a vote about doing an action

member.name: M:BombCommands.Vote(System.String,System.Boolean)
Vote
member.summary: Vote with yes or no

member.name: M:BombCommands.RemoveVote(System.String)
Remove vote
member.summary: Removes the vote of a user

Time left of vote
member.summary: Shows remaining voting time

member.name: M:BombCommands.CancelVote(System.String)
Cancel vote
member.summary: Cancels a voting process

member.name: M:BombCommands.ForceEndVote(System.String)
Force-end vote
member.summary: Skips the countdown of the voting process

member.name: M:BombCommands.Status(TwitchBomb,System.String,System.Boolean)
Status
member.summary: Sends a message with the current status of the bomb. Including things like time, strikes and solves.

member.name: M:BombCommands.Pause(TwitchBomb)
Pause
member.summary: Pauses the bomb timer.

member.name: M:BombCommands.Unpause(TwitchBomb)
Unpause
member.summary: Starts the bomb timer.

member.name: M:BombCommands.ChangeTimer(TwitchBomb,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
Change Timer
member.summary: Adds, substracts or sets the bomb time.

Change Strikes / Strike Limit
member.summary: Adds, substracts or sets the number of strikes. Replace strikes with strikelimit to change the strike limit.

member.name: T:HoldableCommands

member.name: M:HoldableCommands.Hold(TwitchHoldable)
Hold
member.summary: Holds the holdable.

member.name: M:HoldableCommands.Drop(TwitchHoldable)
Drop
member.summary: Drops the holdable.

member.name: M:HoldableCommands.Flip(TwitchHoldable)
Turn
member.summary: Turns the holdable around.

member.name: M:HoldableCommands.Throw(FloatingHoldable,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
Throw
member.summary: Throws the holdable with an optional strength.

member.name: T:FreeplayCommands
member.summary: Commands for the freeplay briefcase.

member.name: M:FreeplayCommands.Needy(FloatingHoldable,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
Needy
member.summary: Enables or disables the needy switch.

member.name: M:FreeplayCommands.Hardcore(FloatingHoldable,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
Hardcore
member.summary: Enables or disables the hardcore switch.

member.name: M:FreeplayCommands.ModsOnly(FloatingHoldable,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
Mods Only
member.summary: Enables or disables the mods only.

member.name: M:FreeplayCommands.ChangeTimerHours(FloatingHoldable,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
Set Time
member.summary: Sets the amount of time the bomb will have.

member.name: M:FreeplayCommands.ChangeBombCount(FloatingHoldable,System.Int32)
Set Bombs
member.summary: Sets the number of bombs.

member.name: M:FreeplayCommands.ChangeModuleCount(FloatingHoldable,System.Int32)
Set Modules
member.summary: Sets the number of modules each bomb will have.

member.name: M:FreeplayCommands.Start(FloatingHoldable)
Start
member.summary: Start the game.

member.name: M:FreeplayCommands.StartAdvanced(FloatingHoldable,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
Advanced Set / Start
member.summary: Sets or starts a bomb with a bunch of parameters. Combine any of the following to set the bomb parameters. (hours):[minutes]:[seconds], [#] bombs, [#] modules, needy, hardcore, needy.

member.name: T:ModuleCommands
member.summary: Commands that can be run on a module.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Help(TwitchModule,System.Boolean)
Help
member.summary: Sends a message to chat with information on what commands you can use to solve the module.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Player(TwitchModule,System.String)
Player
member.summary: Tells you what user has the module claimed.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.BombTurnAround(TwitchModule)
Queue Flip
member.summary: Queues the bomb to be flipped over when the module is solved.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.BombTurnAroundCancel(TwitchModule)
Cancel Queued Flip
member.summary: Cancels a previously queued flip when the module was solved.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Claim(TwitchModule,System.String,System.Boolean)
Claim
member.summary: Claims the module or queues to claim it if it's already claimed.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Unview(TwitchModule)
Unview
member.summary: Stops viewing the module with a camera.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.View(TwitchModule,System.String,System.String)
View / ViewPin
member.summary: Puts the module into a dedicated view. viewpin requires either moderator+ or the module allows pinning at any time.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Show(TwitchModule)
Show
member.summary: Selects the module on the bomb.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Solve(TwitchModule,System.String)
Solve
member.summary: Forces a module to solve itself. Requires either Admin rank or the module to not be supported on TP.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Unclaim(TwitchModule,System.String,System.String)
Unclaim
member.summary: Removes your claim on a module or your queued claim. unclaim unview also unviews the module.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Solved(TwitchModule,System.String)
Solved
member.summary: Changes the color of a module's ID tag to green to mark it as "solved".

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Assign(TwitchModule,System.String,System.String)
Assign
member.summary: Assigns a module to another user. Usually requires mod rank but if you are claiming the module you can attempt to assign it to another user.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Take(TwitchModule,System.String,System.Boolean)
Take
member.summary: Request that the current user releases their claim on the module.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Mine(TwitchModule,System.String,System.Boolean)
Mine
member.summary: Indicates that you are still working on the module. Only the person who has the claim can cancel the take.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Mark(TwitchModule)
Mark
member.summary: Changes the color of a module's ID tag to black.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.Unmark(TwitchModule)
Unmark
member.summary: Returns the color of a module's ID back to default.

member.name: M:ModuleCommands.DefaultCommand(TwitchModule,System.String,System.String)
Zoom, Superzoom and Tilt
member.summary: Zooms into a module for (duration) seconds. (command) allows you to send a command to the module while it's zooming. Superzoom allows you more control over the zoom. (factor) controls how much it's zoomed in with 2 being a 2x zoom. (x) and (y) controls where the camera points with (0, 0) and (1, 1) being top left and bottom right respectively. Tilt will tilt the camera around the module in a direction so you can get better angle to look at the module. (direction) can be up, right, down or left and combinations like upleft. (angle) can be any number where 0 is the top of the module and goes clockwise. Zoom and Tilt or Superzoom and Tilt can be be put back to back to do both at the same time.

member.name: T:MainThreadQueue
member.summary: Allows the execution of a function with the guarantee that it will run on Unity's mainthread.

member.name: M:MainThreadQueue.Initialize
member.summary: Stores the current thread ID, allowing enqueued functions to execute immediately if they were already on Unity's mainthread. Must be called from Unity's mainthread to work properly.

member.name: M:MainThreadQueue.ProcessQueue
member.summary: Runs all enqueued functions. Must be called from Unity's mainthread to work properly.
